text: Despite Kenya Moore ’ s denial that she ’ s not been fired by Bravo, reports say she won ’ t appear on “ The Real Housewives of Atlanta ” next season. Moore, who recently went on record to bash rumors of faking her pregnancy and an impending divorce, was not offered a letter to return to RHOA, according to a Wednesday, May 24 report from Straight from the A. The local gossip site reported the former Miss USA was not in attendance at a mandatory meeting for the ‘ wives. When folks inquired about her absence, it was reportedly confirmed she won ’ t be in season 11. Sources tell the website Moore may be relegated to being a friend of the show, however, Bravo won ’ t confirm the cast line up until later in the summer, according to AJC Radio & TV Talk. Reportedly
